references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models, a foundational model for many image generation methods, including those used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with CLIP latents
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for generating images based on text descriptions using CLIP, a key technique used and improved upon in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper details a method for high-resolution image generation using latent diffusion models, which is directly relevant to the high-quality image generation goals of the current paper.
This paper is a direct comparison paper, focusing on open-vocabulary layout-to-image generation, which is the central topic of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Instancediffusion: Instance-level control for image generation
references.reason: This paper is another direct comparison paper, introducing a method for layout-to-image generation that enables precise control over the generation process, which is a core focus of the current paper.
